https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dksV4saoWIgFJaMCUYTc352u9AH.jpg Three friends, actresses from Colombia, Venezuela and Cuba, first met while acting in a soap opera. Years later, they meet again for vacation in a farm in eastern Colombia. Sitting around a bonfire and thanks to the arrival of an unknown cowhand, they begin to tell frightening stories. Alborada Carmesí
